SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT max(c.record_date) record_date FROM R_MT_PRO_USER_ROLE ru LEFT JOIN MT_PROJECT p ON ru.pro_id=p.id LEFT JOIN MT_EVENT e ON e .PRO_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN MT_CASE c ON c.event_id = e.ID WHERE 1=1 and c.id is not null and e.state='1'
and ru.user_id = '${userId}'
and name like '%${proname}%'
and code like '%${code}%'
and record_date > to_date('${startdate}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and record_date < to_date('${enddate}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')+1
GROUP BY name, code
)

SELECT b.n n, b.id id, b.name name, b.code code, TO_CHAR(b.record_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') record_date
FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM n, A .* FROM ( SELECT p.id id, p.NAME name, p.code code, max(c.record_date) record_date FROM R_MT_PRO_USER_ROLE ru LEFT JOIN MT_PROJECT p ON ru.pro_id=p.id LEFT JOIN MT_EVENT e ON E .PRO_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN MT_CASE c ON c.event_id = e.ID WHERE 1=1 and c.id is not null and e.state='1'
and ru.user_id = '${userId}'
and name like '%${proname}%'
and code like '%${code}%'
and record_date > to_date('${startdate}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and record_date < to_date('${enddate}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')+1
GROUP BY p.id, name, code ) a ) b
where b.n > (${page}-1)*${rows} and b.n <= ${page}*${rows} order by b.id

SELECT b.n n, b.process_id process_id, b.NAME name, b.ARCHIEVE_NUM archieve_num, b.form_flow_num_in_book form_flow_num_in_book, TO_CHAR(b.RECORD_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') record_date FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM n, A .* FROM ( SELECT c.process_id process_id, ur.REALNAME name, e.ARCHIEVE_NUM archieve_num, c.form_flow_num_in_book form_flow_num_in_book, c.record_date record_date FROM MT_PROJECT p LEFT JOIN MT_EVENT e ON E .PRO_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN MT_CASE c ON c.event_id = e.ID LEFT JOIN MT_USER ur on ur.id = c.record_user_id WHERE 1=1 and c.id is not null and e.state='1'
and form_flow_num_in_book like '%${formflownuminbook}%'
and archieve_num like '%${anum}%'
and record_date > to_date('${startdate}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
